Title: Relates to preventing voter registration of ineligible persons
Summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles, in cooperation with the New York state board of elections, to ensure that no persons who are not eligible to register to vote within the state are registered to vote by the actions of the department.
LawCode: Add ยง224-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to preventing voter registration
